short.de: Chatten Sie mit ChatGPT bei allen Google-Suchanfragen.
short.es: Chatea con ChatGPT en todas las búsquedas de Google.
short.fr: Discutez avec ChatGPT sur toutes les recherches Google.
short.he: צ'אט עם ChatGPT בכל חיפושי Google
short.pt_PT: Bate-papo com ChatGPT em todas as pesquisas do Google.
short.ro: Chat cu ChatGPT pe toate căutările pe Google.
short.ru: Общайтесь с ChatGPT во всех поисковых запросах Google.
short.uk: Спілкуйтеся з ChatGPT у всіх пошукових запитах Google.
short.zh_CN: 在所有谷歌搜索中与 ChatGPT 聊天。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Generates Claude™ 2 (by anthropic) chat results for the query you typed on google right from google's page for FREE. It also allows you to continue the chat with Claude™. 
Unlike few other tools here there is no limit on number of free queries per day. You have access to unlimited free queries.
For any suggestions check out our website(github). Feel free to create a ticket or send a pull request if you need for any changes.

- [2/8/24][v0.0.7]: Added option for choosing either of claude2-0 and claude2.1 based on geolocation.

LEGAL:
Disclaimer: ClaudeGoogle is neither official Anthropic™ application or a Google Application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently and has no affiliation to Google or Anthropic.

All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
ClaudeGoogle doesn’t endorse or sponsor this Chrome extension. ClaudeGoogle is not licensed by and is not a subsidiary of Anthropic Inc.

All of them are registered trademarks. ClaudeGoogle App is not related to any of the above corporations and is developed as an independent project.
